</ul></li></ul><div class="clear"></div></div><div class="page-title " ><a class="mobileMenuLink showIfMobile menu-toggle"  href="">menu</a><div class="main"><span class="flag fr w32"></span><span class="flag fr w24"></span><span class="hideIfMobile">2022</span><span class="hideIfMobile">&raquo;</span><font class="hideIfMobile">109th</font><h1 class="">Tour de France</h1><font class="hideIfMobile">(2.UWT)</font></div><div class="sub"><span class="showIfMobile">2022</span><span class="showIfMobile">&raquo;</span><span class="blue">Stage 21 <font style="font-weight: normal; ">(Final)</font></span><span class="red fw400">(115.6km)</span></div></div><div class="clear"></div><div class="desktop-ad leaderbord race"></div><div class="mob-ad leaderbord race"></div><div class="top-cont"></div><div class="top-cont-mobile top-cont-mobile-race"></div><div class="page-content page-object default " data-no_menu="0" ><h2></h2><div class="w100" >
<div class="text-regular">Preview statistics for Tour de France 2022.</div>
</div>
<div class="w47 left mb_w100" >
<div class="mt20"><h3>Info</h3><ul class="infolist fs13" style=""><li><div>Startdate:</div> <div>2022-07-01</div></li>
<li><div>Enddate:</div> <div>2022-07-24</div></li>
<li><div>Category:</div> <div>Men Elite</div></li>
<li><div>UCI Tour:</div> <div>UCI Worldtour</div></li>
<li><div>Total distance:</div> <div>3350</div></li>
<li><div>Logo</div> <div><img src="images/logo/bn/eh/tour-de-france-677.png" style="max-height: 100px; max-width: 100%;  " /></div></li>
</ul></div>
<div class="mt40"><h3>Sites</h3><ul class="list circle bluelink fs14"><li><a  target="_blank"   class="" href="https://www.instagram.com/letourdefrance/">www.instagram.com/letourdefrance/</a></li>

<li><a  target="_blank"   class="" href="https://www.facebook.com/letour">www.facebook.com/letour</a></li>
</ul></div>
<div class="mt20"><h3>Stages</h3>
